title: Avonvale Bowls Club
summary: Frontend Development: Designed and developed a responsive website using Next.js and TypeScript, delivering a visually appealing and accessible user experience.
Architecture and Scalability: Built a scalable, maintainable frontend architecture aligned with modern web standards to support future enhancements.
API Integration: Implemented RESTful API services, enabling efficient and reliable data exchange between frontend and backend systems.
CMS Integration: Integrated Contentful CMS, streamlining content management and empowering the editorial team to update over 200 monthly posts effortlessly.
Clean Code and TDD: Adhered to clean coding practices, including test-driven development (TDD) and modular architecture, to ensure a maintainable and efficient codebase.
